definition: to weaken/to go soft (at the knees)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: What do we expect from the people who develop our software?
sentences.chinese: 我们对为我们开发软件的人都有着什么样的期望呢？
开发软件的迭代和增强。

sentences.english: But this book is for those who wish to develop software in R.
sentences.chinese: 但是这本书实际是为运用R语言开发软件的人编写。

sentences.english: They assumed that making software is like building a bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们假定开发软件就象造桥。

sentences.english: We develop software to solve problems.
sentences.chinese: 我们开发软件是为了解决问题。

sentences.english: He made me get out of the car and my legs felt really weak because I'd only just climaxed.
sentences.chinese: 他让我下车，但我却因为刚刚高潮而两腿发软。

sentences.english: I knock limply on the door and open it.
sentences.chinese: 我手脚发软地敲了敲门，然后开了门。

sentences.english: Don't be talked into doing anything you don't like.
sentences.chinese: 不要耳朵发软，去做自己不愿意做的事情。

sentences.english: His palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy.
sentences.chinese: 他的手掌出汗，双膝发软，两臂沉重。

sentences.english: Sometimes we seem to court risk by developing our software in an isolated environment.
sentences.chinese: 有时在独立环境下开发软件我们似乎也可以控制风险。

sentences.english: The goal is to balance all the forces to develop software intelligently.
sentences.chinese: 目的是均衡所有的力量以有效地开发软件。

sentences.english: All hands shall be feeble, and all knees shall be weak as water.

sentences.chinese: 头晕，全身发软，四肢无力，呕吐。

definition: calf (back of the leg below the knee)
to turn pale/to lose color/to go white
to feel a chill (as an emotional response)/to feel cold (as a clinical symptom)
to ache/to be sore/to feel painful
to collapse (from dehydration or loss of blood)/heat exhaustion
